nodes.text: COO-2310 was one of the supposedly rogue droids that attacked Constable Zuvio during his investigation of a banking ship robbery in Niima Outpost.

As a part of Rikard Lovas's plot to steal the electronic credits of the citizens of Niima Outpost on Jakku, COO-2310 and several other droids were sent to an abandoned farmhouse to wait for Zuvio as he tracked the missing secretary droid CZ-1G5. COO was destroyed when an EG-6 power droid caused the farmhouse to explode.
